fields.body:
Hello {{ user.first_name }},
 
Welcome to the SocialCoding4Good volunteer community! We're thrilled to have you join us in developing and improving open source software solutions for social good.
 
What happens next?
 
First, we suggest you login to verify your profile information and change your password. www.socialcoding4good.org/myprofile
Username: {{ user.email }}
Temporary Password: {{ random_password }}
 
Then, based on the information you've included in your profile, such as experience, technical skillset, availability, and Project Partners which interest you, our team will try to match you with a current task or project.
 
  • If there is an immediate fit, we will follow on via email with instructions on how to get started as a contributor. In some cases, we may ask for further information, or recommend you check out additional resources.
  • If there is not an immediate fit, your profile will remain active, and we'll continue to try to match you to projects as we launch new partners and our current project requirements shift
 
Either way, you can update your profile with new information anytime, and we'll keep you updated on program news and events from time to time.
 
Questions? Email us, or message us using the Contact Form at http://www.socialcoding4good.org/contact
 
Thanks for signing up - we're looking forward to seeing your impact!
 
The SocialCoding4Good team
info@www.socialcoding4good.org
Find us on Twitter @sc4g
fields.subject: Welcome to SocialCoding4Good!
